required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ellipse Intramedullary High Tibial Osteotomy Nail Study
clinical_study.official_title: Outcomes Registry of Patients With Osteoarthritis and Varus Malalignment of the Knee Treated With Ellipse Intramedullary High Tibial Osteotomy (IM HTO) Nail System

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to collect outcomes data in patients implanted with the Ellipse IM HTO Nail System.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of correcting their deformity, an average of 3 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Measured as either weight-bearing line (percent) or HKA angle (degrees)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of consolidation (bone healing), an average of 4 months
primary_outcome.description: Measured as either weight-bearing line (percent) or HKA angle (degrees)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of correcting their deformity, an average of 3 weeks
Participants will be followed for the duration of consolidation (bone healing), an average of 4 months
Participants will be followed for the duration of correcting their deformity, an average of 3 weeks
Participants will be followed for the duration of consolidation (bone healing), an average of 4 months
Participants will be followed for the duration of correcting their deformity, an average of 3 weeks
Participants will be followed for the duration of consolidation (bone healing), an average of 4 months
Participants will be followed through 2 years post-operative
Participants will be followed for the duration of correcting their deformity, an average of 3 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Graded 0 through 2, corresponding to Not Healing, Healing, and Healed

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of consolidation (bone healing), an average of 4 months
secondary_outcome.description: Graded 0 through 2, corresponding to Not Healing, Healing, and Healed
Graded 0 through 2, corresponding to Not Healing, Healing, and Healed
Graded 0 through 2, corresponding to Not Healing, Healing, and Healed

other_outcome.measure: All Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) and Unanticipated Adverse Device Effects (UADEs)
other_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed through 2 years post-operative

other_outcome.measure: All non-serious adverse events in the limb related to the device or study procedure. Study procedure includes implant procedure and correction lengthening procedure.
other_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed through 2 years post-operative
Participants will be followed through 2 years post-operative
Participants will be followed through 2 years post-operative

intervention.intervention_name: Ellipse Technologies Intramedullary High Tibial Osteotomy Nail System

study_pop.textblock: Patients implanted with the Ellipse IM HTO Nail system for osteoarthritis and varus malalignment of the knee.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient implanted with the Ellipse IM HTO Nail System for osteoarthritis and varus malalignment of the knee
- Patient signs informed consent for the use of their personal private data.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient is currently enrolled in another clinical trial for high tibial osteotomy.

overall_official.affiliation: University of Minnesota - Clinical and Translational Science Institute
